testcase.name: To validate booking flow of room
testcase.system-out: Given user should be on login page..........................................passed When user should give username and password.................................passed And user select "London",hotel,room type....................................passed And no of rooms.............................................................passed And user enter checkin,checkout.............................................passed And user enter adult, child and click.......................................passed And user select hotel and click continue....................................passed And user enter firstname,lastname,address...................................passed And user enter card no,card type,expmonth,expyear,cvv and click book........passed Then User should be in booking confirmation page............................passed
